parameters.description:
Filter applications using key:value format. Supported filter keys:
- name: Filter by application name (e.g., name:HR)
- id: Filter by application ID (e.g., id:0b63249c-95bf-4cc0-a7cc-d7faaaf1dac0)
- human_id: Filter by human-readable ID (e.g., human_id:HR)
- hostname: Filter by hostname or support domain (e.g., hostname:portal.example.com)
- source: Filter by application source name (e.g., source:cloudflare)
- ip_subnet: Filter by IP subnet in CIDR notation (e.g., ip_subnet:192.168.1.0/24).
.
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Limit of number of results to return.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Order by result by field name and order (e.g., name:asc).
parameters.name: order_by

success.description: Indicates whether the API call was successful.

count.description: Returns the total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Returns the current page within paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Returns the number of results per page of results.

total_count.description: Returns the total results available without any search parameters.

application_type_description.example: Applications used to manage employees and workforce tools.

hostnames.description: Returns the list of hostnames for the application.

ip_subnets.description: Returns the list of IP subnets for the application.

port_protocols.description: Returns the list of port protocols for the application.

support_domains.description: Returns the list of support domains for the application.
